  53# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  54# --- class ImageWidgetView(QWidget) -------------------------------------------------------
  55# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  56class ImageWidgetView(QWidget):
  57    """A widget for displaying images."""
  58
  59    def __init__(self, controller, colorData=None):
  60        """Initialize the ImageWidgetView.
  61
  62        Args:
  63            controller: Reference to the controller
  64            colorData (numpy.ndarray, optional): Color data of the image. Defaults to None.
  65        """
  66        super().__init__()
  67        self.controller = controller
  68        self.label = QLabel(self)  # create a QtLabel for pixmap
  69        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray):
  70            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
  71        self.setPixmap(colorData)
  72
  73    def resize(self):
  74        """Resize the widget and the label to fit the window size."""
  75        self.label.resize(self.size())
  76        self.label.setPixmap(self.imagePixmap.scaled(self.size(), Qt.KeepAspectRatio))
  77
  78    def resizeEvent(self, event):
  79        """Handle the resize event.
  80
  81        Args:
  82            event: The resize event
  83        """
  84        self.resize()
  85        super().resizeEvent(event)
  86
  87    def setPixmap(self, colorData):
  88        """Set the pixmap from color data.
  89
  90        Args:
  91            colorData (numpy.ndarray): Color data of the image
  92
  93        Returns:
  94            QPixmap: The pixmap created from the color data
  95        """
  96        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray):
  97            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
  98        height, width, channel = colorData.shape  # compute pixmap
  99        bytesPerLine = channel * width
 100        # clip
 101        colorData[colorData > 1.0] = 1.0
 102        colorData[colorData < 0.0] = 0.0
 103
 104        qImg = QImage((colorData * 255).astype(np.uint8), width, height, bytesPerLine, QImage.Format_RGB888)  # QImage
 105        self.imagePixmap = QPixmap.fromImage(qImg)
 106        self.resize()
 107
 108        return self.imagePixmap
 109
 110    def setQPixmap(self, qPixmap):
 111        """Set the pixmap directly from a QPixmap.
 112
 113        Args:
 114            qPixmap (QPixmap): The QPixmap to set
 115        """
 116        self.imagePixmap = qPixmap
 117        self.resize()
 118
 119    @staticmethod
 120    def emptyImageColorData():
 121        """Create an empty image color data array.
 122
 123        Returns:
 124            numpy.ndarray: An array filled with a light gray color
 125        """
 126        return np.ones((90, 160, 3)) * (220 / 255)
 127
 128class FigureWidget(FigureCanvas):
 129    """Matplotlib Figure Widget"""
 130
 131    def __init__(self, parent=None, width=5, height=5, dpi=100):
 132        """Initialize the FigureWidget.
 133
 134        Args:
 135            parent (QWidget, optional): Parent widget. Defaults to None.
 136            width (int, optional): Width of the figure. Defaults to 5.
 137            height (int, optional): Height of the figure. Defaults to 5.
 138            dpi (int, optional): Dots per inch. Defaults to 100.
 139        """
 140        # create Figure
 141        self.fig = Figure(figsize=(width, height), dpi=dpi)
 142        self.axes = self.fig.add_subplot(111)
 143        FigureCanvas.__init__(self, self.fig)  # explicit call of super constructor
 144        self.setParent(parent)
 145        FigureCanvas.updateGeometry(self)
 146        self.setMinimumSize(200, 200)
 147
 148    def plot(self, X, Y, mode, clear=False):
 149        """Plot data on the figure.
 150
 151        Args:
 152            X (array-like): X data to plot
 153            Y (array-like): Y data to plot
 154            mode (str): Plot mode
 155            clear (bool, optional): Whether to clear the axes before plotting. Defaults to False.
 156        """
 157        if clear:
 158            self.axes.clear()
 159        self.axes.plot(X, Y, mode)
 160        try:
 161            self.fig.canvas.draw()
 162        except Exception:
 163            time.sleep(0.5)
 164            self.fig.canvas.draw()
 165
 166class ImageGalleryView(QSplitter):
 167    """
 168    ImageGallery(QSplitter)
 169
 170    +-------------------------------------------+
 171    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | \
 172    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 173    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 174    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 175    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 176    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 177    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |   >   GridLayout
 178    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 179    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 180    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
 181    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
 182    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | /
 183    +-------------------------------------------+  <    splitter
 184    | [<] [1x1][3x2][6x4][9x6][page number] [>] |       [pushButton] HorizontalLayout
 185    +-------------------------------------------+
 186    """
 187
 188    def __init__(self, controller_=None, shapeMode=None):
 189        """Initialize the ImageGalleryView.
 190
 191        Args:
 192            controller_ (optional): Reference to the controller. Defaults to None.
 193            shapeMode (optional): Shape mode for the gallery. Defaults to None.
 194        """
 195        if pref.verbose:
 196            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.__init__()")
 197
 198        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
 199
 200        self.controller = controller_
 201        self.shapeMode = controller.GalleryMode._3x2 if not shapeMode else shapeMode  # default display mode
 202        self.pageNumber = 0
 203
 204        self.imagesControllers = []
 205
 206        self.images = QFrame()
 207        self.images.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
 208        self.imagesLayout = QGridLayout()
 209        self.images.setLayout(self.imagesLayout)
 210
 211        self.buildGridLayoutWidgets()
 212
 213        self.previousPageButton = QPushButton('<')
 214        self.previousPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_previousPage)
 215        self._1x1Button = QPushButton('1x1')
 216        self._1x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_1x1)
 217        self._2x1Button = QPushButton('2x1')
 218        self._2x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_2x1)
 219        self._3x2Button = QPushButton('3x2')
 220        self._3x2Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_3x2)
 221        self._6x4Button = QPushButton('6x4')
 222        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
 223        self._9x6Button = QPushButton('9x6')
 224        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
 225        self.nextPageButton = QPushButton('>')
 226        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
 227
 228        self.pageNumberLabel = QLabel(str(self.pageNumber) + "/ ...")
 229
 230        self.buttons = QWidget()
 231        self.buttonsLayout = QHBoxLayout()
 232        self.buttons.setLayout(self.buttonsLayout)
 233        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.previousPageButton)
 234        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._1x1Button)
 235        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._2x1Button)
 236        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._3x2Button)
 237        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._6x4Button)
 238        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._9x6Button)
 239        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.nextPageButton)
 240
 241        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.pageNumberLabel)
 242
 243        self.addWidget(self.images)
 244        self.addWidget(self.buttons)
 245        self.setSizes([1525, 82])
 246
 247    def currentPage(self):
 248        """Get the current page number.
 249
 250        Returns:
 251            int: Current page number
 252        """
 253        return self.pageNumber
 254
 255    def changePageNumber(self, step):
 256        """Change the current page number by a given step.
 257
 258        Args:
 259            step (int): Step to change the page number
 260        """
 261        if pref.verbose:
 262            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(", step, ")")
 263
 264        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode) * controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
 265        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes) - 1) // nbImagePerPage) + 1
 266
 267        if len(self.controller.model.processPipes) > 0:
 268            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
 269            if (self.pageNumber + step) > maxPage - 1:
 270                self.pageNumber = 0
 271            elif (self.pageNumber + step) < 0:
 272                self.pageNumber = maxPage - 1
 273            else:
 274                self.pageNumber = self.pageNumber + step
 275            self.updateImages()
 276            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
 277            if pref.verbose:
 278                print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:", self.pageNumber, "| max page:", maxPage, ")")
 279
 280    def updateImages(self):
 281        """Update the images in the gallery."""
 282        if pref.verbose:
 283            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages()")
 284
 285        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode) * controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
 286        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes) - 1) // nbImagePerPage) + 1
 287
 288        index = 0
 289        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)):
 290            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
 291                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
 292                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())
 293                index += 1
 294        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber) + "/" + str(maxPage - 1))
 295
 296    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
 297        """Update a specific image in the gallery.
 298
 299        Args:
 300            idx (int): Index of the image to update
 301            processPipe: Process pipe associated with the image
 302            filename (str): Filename of the image
 303        """
 304        if pref.verbose:
 305            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage()")
 306        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]
 307        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
 308        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image " + filename + " done!")
 309
 310    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
 311        """Reset the grid layout widgets."""
 312        if pref.verbose:
 313            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets()")
 314
 315        for w in self.imagesControllers:
 316            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
 317            w.view.deleteLater()
 318        self.imagesControllers = []
 319
 320    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
 321        """Build the grid layout widgets."""
 322        if pref.verbose:
 323            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets()")
 324
 325        imageIndex = 0
 326        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)):
 327            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
 328                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
 329                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
 330                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view, i, j)
 331                imageIndex += 1
 332
 333    def wheelEvent(self, event):
 334        """Handle the wheel event for changing pages.
 335
 336        Args:
 337            event: The wheel event
 338        """
 339        if pref.verbose:
 340            print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent()")
 341
 342        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0:
 343            self.changePageNumber(+1)
 344            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1:
 345                self.controller.selectImage(0)
 346
 347        else:
 348            self.changePageNumber(-1)
 349            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1:
 350                self.controller.selectImage(0)
 351        event.accept()
 352
 353    def mousePressEvent(self, event):
 354        """Handle the mouse press event for selecting images.
 355
 356        Args:
 357            event: The mouse press event
 358        """
 359        if pref.verbose:
 360            print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent()")
 361
 362        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(), ImageWidgetView):
 363            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
 364        else:
 365            id = -1
 366
 367        if id != -1:  # an image is clicked, select it!
 368            self.controller.selectImage(id)
 369        event.accept()
 370
 371class AppView(QMainWindow):
 372    """
 373    MainWindow(View)
 374    """
 375
 376    def __init__(self, _controller=None, shapeMode=None, HDRcontroller=None):
 377        """Initialize the AppView.
 378
 379        Args:
 380            _controller (optional): Reference to the controller. Defaults to None.
 381            shapeMode (optional): Shape mode for the gallery. Defaults to None.
 382            HDRcontroller (optional): Reference to the HDR controller. Defaults to None.
 383        """
 384        super().__init__()
 385        scale = 0.8
 386        self.controller = _controller
 387        self.setWindowGeometry(scale=scale)
 388        self.setWindowTitle('uHDR - Rmi Cozot (c) 2020-2021')  # title
 389        self.statusBar().showMessage('Welcome to uHDR!')  # status bar
 390
 391        self.topContainer = QWidget()
 392        self.topLayout = QHBoxLayout()
 393
 394        self.imageGalleryController = controller.ImageGalleryController(self)
 395
 396        self.topLayout.addWidget(self.imageGalleryController.view)
 397
 398        self.topContainer.setLayout(self.topLayout)
 399        self.setCentralWidget(self.topContainer)
 400        self.dock = controller.MultiDockController(self, HDRcontroller)
 401        self.addDockWidget(Qt.RightDockWidgetArea, self.dock.view)
 402        self.resizeDocks([self.dock.view], [int(self.controller.screenSize[0].width() * scale // 4)], Qt.Horizontal)
 403
 404        self.buildFileMenu()
 405        self.buildDockMenu()
 406        self.buildDisplayHDR()
 407        self.buildExport()
 408        self.buildPreferences()
 409
 410    def getImageGalleryController(self):
 411        """Get the image gallery controller.
 412
 413        Returns:
 414            ImageGalleryController: The image gallery controller
 415        """
 416        return self.imageGalleryController
 417
 418    def resizeEvent(self, event):
 419        """Handle the resize event.
 420
 421        Args:
 422            event: The resize event
 423        """
 424        super().resizeEvent(event)
 425
 426    def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8):
 427        """Set the window geometry.
 428
 429        Args:
 430            scale (float, optional): Scale factor for the window size. Defaults to 0.8.
 431        """
 432        displayCoord = QDesktopWidget().screenGeometry(1)
 433        if len(self.controller.screenSize) > 1:
 434            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[1].width(), self.controller.screenSize[1].height()
 435        else:
 436            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[0].width(), self.controller.screenSize[0].height()
 437
 438        self.setGeometry(displayCoord.left(), displayCoord.top() + 50, math.floor(width * scale), math.floor(height * scale))
 439        self.showMaximized()
 440
 441    def buildFileMenu(self):
 442        """Build the file menu."""
 443        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
 444        fileMenu = menubar.addMenu('&File')  # file menu
 445
 446        selectDir = QAction('&Select directory', self)
 447        selectDir.setShortcut('Ctrl+O')
 448        selectDir.setStatusTip('[File] select a directory')
 449        selectDir.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSelectDir)
 450        fileMenu.addAction(selectDir)
 451
 452        selectSave = QAction('&Save', self)
 453        selectSave.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')
 454        selectSave.setStatusTip('[File] saving processpipe metadata')
 455        selectSave.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSave)
 456        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)
 457
 458        quit = QAction('&Quit', self)
 459        quit.setShortcut('Ctrl+Q')
 460        quit.setStatusTip('[File] saving updates and quit')
 461        quit.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackQuit)
 462        fileMenu.addAction(quit)
 463
 464    def buildPreferences(self):
 465        """Build the preferences menu."""
 466        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
 467        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')  # file menu
 468
 469        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
 470
 471        def cbd(tag):
 472            """Callback function for setting the display.
 473
 474            Args:
 475                tag: Display tag
 476            """
 477            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
 478            self.statusBar().showMessage("switching HDR Display to: " + tag + "!")
 479            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
 480            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
 481
 482        prefDisplays = []
 483        for i, d in enumerate(displayList):
 484            if d != 'none':
 485                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to ' + d, self)
 486                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
 487                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
 488                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)
 489
 490    def buildDisplayHDR(self):
 491        """Build the display HDR menu."""
 492        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
 493        displayHDRmenu = menubar.addMenu('&Display HDR')  # file menu
 494
 495        displayHDR = QAction('&Display HDR image', self)
 496        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+H')
 497        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] display HDR image')
 498        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackDisplayHDR)
 499        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
 500
 501        displayHDR = QAction('&Compare raw and edited HDR image', self)
 502        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+C')
 503        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] compare raw HDR image and edited one')
 504        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCompareRawEditedHDR)
 505        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
 506
 507        closeHDR = QAction('&reset HDR display', self)
 508        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
 509        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
 510        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)
 511        displayHDRmenu.addAction(closeHDR)
 512

 567class ImageInfoView(QSplitter):
 568    """A view for displaying image information and metadata."""
 569
 570    def __init__(self, _controller):
 571        """Initialize the ImageInfoView.
 572
 573        Args:
 574            _controller: Reference to the controller
 575        """
 576        if pref.verbose:
 577            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__()")
 578
 579        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
 580
 581        self.controller = _controller
 582
 583        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
 584
 585        self.layout = QFormLayout()
 586
 587        # Image information fields
 588        self.imageName = AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 589        self.imagePath = AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 590        self.imageSize = AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 591        self.imageDynamicRange = AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 592        self.colorSpace = AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 593        self.imageType = AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 594        self.imageBPS = AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 595        self.imageExpoTime = AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 596        self.imageFNumber = AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 597        self.imageISO = AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 598        self.imageCamera = AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 599        self.imageSoftware = AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 600        self.imageLens = AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 601        self.imageFocalLength = AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
 602
 603        # Separator line
 604        line = QFrame()
 605        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
 606        self.layout.addRow(line)
 607
 608        # User-defined tags
 609        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
 610        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
 611        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
 612        self.userDefinedTags = []
 613        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
 614            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
 615            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
 616            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
 617                self.userDefinedTags.append(AdvanceCheckBox(self, groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
 618            line = QFrame()
 619            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
 620            self.layout.addRow(line)
 621
 622        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
 623
 624        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
 625        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
 626        self.container = QLabel()
 627        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
 628        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
 629        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
 630
 631        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
 632        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
 633        self.setSizes([60, 40])
 634
 635    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
 636        """Set the process pipe and update the view with image metadata.
 637
 638        Args:
 639            processPipe: The process pipe to set
 640        """
 641        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
 642        if pref.verbose:
 643            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(", image_.name, ")")
 644        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] is not None:
 645            self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
 646        else:
 647            self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
 648        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] is not None:
 649            self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
 650        else:
 651            self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
 652        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] is not None:
 653            self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width']) + " x " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
 654        else:
 655            self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
 656        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] is not None:
 657            self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
 658        else:
 659            self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
 660        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] is not None:
 661            self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
 662        else:
 663            self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
 664        if image_.type is not None:
 665            self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))
 666        else:
 667            self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
 668        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] is not None:
 669            self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
 670        else:
 671            self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
 672        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] is not None:
 673            self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0]) + " / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
 674        else:
 675            self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
 676        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] is not None:
 677            self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))
 678        else:
 679            self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
 680        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] is not None:
 681            self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))
 682        else:
 683            self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
 684        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] is not None:
 685            self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])
 686        else:
 687            self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
 688        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] is not None:
 689            self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])
 690        else:
 691            self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
 692        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] is not None:
 693            self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
 694        else:
 695            self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
 696        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] is not None:
 697            self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
 698        else:
 699            self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
 700
 701        self.controller.callBackActive = False
 702
 703        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
 704        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
 705
 706        for i, tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
 707            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
 708            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
 709            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
 710                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
 711                    if (acb.rightText == tag[0]) and (acb.leftText == groupKey):
 712                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
 713                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
 714                        acb.setState(on_off)
 715                        break
 716
 717        self.controller.callBackActive = True
 718
 719        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)
 720
 721    def metadataChange(self, metaGroup, metaTag, on_off):
 722        """Handle metadata changes.
 723
 724        Args:
 725            metaGroup: The group of the metadata
 726            metaTag: The tag of the metadata
 727            on_off: The new value of the metadata
 728        """
 729        if self.controller.callBackActive:
 730            self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup, metaTag, on_off)

 732class AdvanceLineEdit(object):
 733    """A custom QLineEdit widget with a label."""
 734
 735    def __init__(self, labelName, defaultText, layout, callBack=None):
 736        """Initialize the AdvanceLineEdit.
 737
 738        Args:
 739            labelName (str): The name of the label
 740            defaultText (str): The default text for the line edit
 741            layout: The layout to add the widget to
 742            callBack (optional): Callback function for text changes. Defaults to None.
 743        """
 744        self.label = QLabel(labelName)
 745        self.lineEdit = QLineEdit(defaultText)
 746        if callBack:
 747            self.lineEdit.textChanged.connect(callBack)
 748        layout.addRow(self.label, self.lineEdit)
 749
 750    def setText(self, txt):
 751        """Set the text of the line edit.
 752
 753        Args:
 754            txt (str): The text to set
 755        """
 756        self.lineEdit.setText(txt)
 757
 758class AdvanceCheckBox(object):
 759    """A custom QCheckBox widget with a label."""
 760
 761    def __init__(self, parent, leftText, rightText, defaultValue, layout):
 762        """Initialize the AdvanceCheckBox.
 763
 764        Args:
 765            parent: Reference to the parent widget
 766            leftText (str): The text for the label
 767            rightText (str): The text for the checkbox
 768            defaultValue: The default value of the checkbox
 769            layout: The layout to add the widget to
 770        """
 771        self.parent = parent
 772        self.leftText = leftText
 773        self.rightText = rightText
 774
 775        self.label = QLabel(leftText)
 776        self.checkbox = QCheckBox(rightText)
 777        self.checkbox.toggled.connect(self.toggled)
 778        layout.addRow(self.label, self.checkbox)
 779
 780    def setState(self, on_off):
 781        """Set the state of the checkbox.
 782
 783        Args:
 784            on_off (bool): The state to set
 785        """
 786        self.checkbox.setChecked(on_off)
 787
 788    def toggled(self):
 789        """Handle the toggled event of the checkbox."""
 790        self.parent.metadataChange(self.leftText, self.rightText, self.checkbox.isChecked())

 951    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
 952        """Set the process pipe and initialize the view components with its parameters.
 953
 954        Args:
 955            processPipe: The process pipe to set
 956        """
 957        if pref.verbose:
 958            print(" [VIEW] >> EditImageView.setProcessPipe()")
 959
 960        # Exposure
 961        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("exposure")
 962        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 963        self.exposure.setValue(value['EV'], callBackActive=False)
 964
 965        # Contrast
 966        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("contrast")
 967        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 968        self.contrast.setValue(value['contrast'], callBackActive=False)
 969
 970        # Tone curve
 971        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("tonecurve")
 972        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 973        self.tonecurve.setValues(value, callBackActive=False)
 974
 975        # Lightness mask
 976        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("lightnessmask")
 977        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 978        self.lightnessmask.setValues(value, callBackActive=False)
 979
 980        # Saturation
 981        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("saturation")
 982        value = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 983        self.saturation.setValue(value['saturation'], callBackActive=False)
 984
 985        # Color Editor 0
 986        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor0")
 987        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 988        self.colorEditor0.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)
 989
 990        # Color Editor 1
 991        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor1")
 992        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 993        self.colorEditor1.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)
 994
 995        # Color Editor 2
 996        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor2")
 997        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
 998        self.colorEditor2.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)
 999
1000        # Color Editor 3
1001        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor3")
1002        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
1003        self.colorEditor3.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)
1004
1005        # Color Editor 4
1006        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("colorEditor4")
1007        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
1008        self.colorEditor4.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)
1009
1010        # Geometry
1011        id = processPipe.getProcessNodeByName("geometry")
1012        values = processPipe.getParameters(id)
1013        self.geometry.setValues(values, callBackActive=False)

1015class MultiDockView(QDockWidget):
1016    """A dock widget for switching between different views."""
1017
1018    def __init__(self, _controller, HDRcontroller=None):
1019        """Initialize the MultiDockView.
1020
1021        Args:
1022            _controller: Reference to the controller
1023            HDRcontroller (optional): Reference to the HDR controller. Defaults to None.
1024        """
1025        if pref.verbose:
1026            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.__init__()")
1027
1028        super().__init__("Image Edit/Info")
1029        self.controller = _controller
1030
1031        self.setAllowedAreas(Qt.LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt.RightDockWidgetArea)
1032
1033        self.childControllers = [
1034            controller.EditImageController(self, HDRcontroller),
1035            controller.ImageInfoController(self),
1036            controller.ImageAestheticsController(self)
1037        ]
1038        self.childController = self.childControllers[0]
1039        self.active = 0
1040        self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
1041        self.repaint()
1042
1043    def switch(self, nb):
1044        """Switch the active dock view.
1045
1046        Args:
1047            nb (int): The index of the view to switch to
1048        """
1049        if pref.verbose:
1050            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.switch(", nb, ")")
1051
1052        if nb != self.active:
1053            self.active = (nb) % len(self.childControllers)
1054            self.childController.view.deleteLater()
1055            self.childController = self.childControllers[self.active]
1056            processPipe = self.controller.parent.imageGalleryController.getSelectedProcessPipe()
1057            self.childController.buildView(processPipe)
1058            self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
1059            self.repaint()
1060
1061    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
1062        """Set the process pipe for the active child controller.
1063
1064        Args:
1065            processPipe: The process pipe to set
1066
1067        Returns:
1068            The result of setting the process pipe in the child controller
1069        """
1070        if pref.verbose:
1071            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.setProcessPipe(", processPipe.getImage().name, ")")
1072        return self.childController.setProcessPipe(processPipe)
1073
1074class AdvanceSliderView(QFrame):
1075    """A custom slider widget with additional controls."""
1076
1077    def __init__(self, controller, name, defaultValue, range, step):
1078        """Initialize the AdvanceSliderView.
1079
1080        Args:
1081            controller: Reference to the controller
1082            name (str): The name of the slider
1083            defaultValue: The default value of the slider
1084            range (tuple): The range of the slider
1085            step (float): The step size of the slider
1086        """
1087        super().__init__()
1088        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
1089        self.controller = controller
1090        self.firstrow = QFrame()
1091
1092        self.vbox = QVBoxLayout()
1093        self.hbox = QHBoxLayout()
1094
1095        self.firstrow.setLayout(self.hbox)
1096
1097        self.label = QLabel(name)
1098        self.auto = QPushButton("auto")
1099        self.editValue = QLineEdit()
1100        self.editValue.setValidator(QDoubleValidator())
1101        self.editValue.setText(str(defaultValue))
1102        self.reset = QPushButton("reset")
1103
1104        self.hbox.addWidget(self.label)
1105        self.hbox.addWidget(self.auto)
1106        self.hbox.addWidget(self.editValue)
1107        self.hbox.addWidget(self.reset)
1108
1109        self.slider = QSlider(Qt.Horizontal)
1110        self.slider.setRange(int(range[0] / step), int(range[1] / step))
1111        self.slider.setValue(int(defaultValue / step))
1112        self.slider.setSingleStep(1)
1113
1114        self.vbox.addWidget(self.firstrow)
1115        self.vbox.addWidget(self.slider)
1116
1117        self.setLayout(self.vbox)
1118
1119        # Callback functions for slider, reset, and auto buttons
1120        self.slider.valueChanged.connect(self.controller.sliderChange)
1121        self.reset.clicked.connect(self.controller.reset)
1122        self.auto.clicked.connect(self.controller.auto)

1385class HDRviewerView(QFrame):
1386    """A view for previewing HDR images."""
1387
1388    def __init__(self, _controller=None, build=False):
1389        """Initialize the HDRviewerView.
1390
1391        Args:
1392            _controller (optional): Reference to the controller. Defaults to None.
1393            build (bool, optional): Whether to build the view. Defaults to False.
1394        """
1395        super().__init__()
1396        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
1397        self.controller = _controller
1398        self.vbox = QVBoxLayout()
1399        self.hboxUp = QHBoxLayout()
1400        self.hboxDown = QHBoxLayout()
1401
1402        self.label = QLabel("hdr preview")
1403        self.resetButton = QPushButton("reset")
1404        self.updateButton = QPushButton("update")
1405        self.compareButton = QPushButton("compare")
1406        self.autoCheckBox = QCheckBox("auto")
1407        if build:
1408            cValue = self.controller.parent.view.dock.view.childControllers[0].model.autoPreviewHDR
1409            self.autoCheckBox.setChecked(cValue)
1410        else:
1411            self.autoCheckBox.setChecked(False)
1412
1413        self.hboxUpContainer = QFrame()
1414        self.hboxUpContainer.setLayout(self.hboxUp)
1415        self.hboxUp.addWidget(self.label)
1416        self.hboxUp.addWidget(self.resetButton)
1417
1418        self.hboxDownContainer = QFrame()
1419        self.hboxDownContainer.setLayout(self.hboxDown)
1420        self.hboxDown.addWidget(self.autoCheckBox)
1421        self.hboxDown.addWidget(self.updateButton)
1422        self.hboxDown.addWidget(self.compareButton)
1423
1424        self.vbox.addWidget(self.hboxUpContainer)
1425        self.vbox.addWidget(self.hboxDownContainer)
1426
1427        self.setLayout(self.vbox)
1428
1429        self.resetButton.clicked.connect(self.reset)
1430        self.updateButton.clicked.connect(self.update)
1431        self.compareButton.clicked.connect(self.compare)
1432        self.autoCheckBox.toggled.connect(self.auto)
1433
1434    def reset(self):
1435        """Reset the HDR preview."""
1436        self.controller.displaySplash()
1437
1438    def update(self):
1439        """Update the HDR preview."""
1440        self.controller.callBackUpdate()
1441
1442    def compare(self):
1443        """Compare the HDR preview with the original image."""
1444        self.controller.callBackCompare()
1445
1446    def auto(self):
1447        """Toggle the auto preview mode."""
1448        self.controller.callBackAuto(self.autoCheckBox.isChecked())

1633    def sliderHueChange(self):
1634        """Handle the change of the hue sliders."""
1635        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1636        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1637
1638        # Redraw hue range and chroma bar
1639        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (100, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='h', height='c')
1640        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1641        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1642        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (0, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='c', height='L')
1643        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1644        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1645
1646        # Call controller
1647        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin, hmax)
1648

1652        vmax = self.sliderChromaMax.value()
1653        # Call controller
1654        self.controller.sliderChromaChange(vmin, vmax)

1659        vmax = self.sliderLightMax.value() / 3.0
1660        # Call controller
1661        self.controller.sliderLightnessChange(vmin, vmax)

class ImageWidgetView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget): 
 57class ImageWidgetView(QWidget):
 58    """A widget for displaying images."""
 59
 60    def __init__(self, controller, colorData=None):
 61        """Initialize the ImageWidgetView.
 62
 63        Args:
 64            controller: Reference to the controller
 65            colorData (numpy.ndarray, optional): Color data of the image. Defaults to None.
 66        """
 67        super().__init__()
 68        self.controller = controller
 69        self.label = QLabel(self)  # create a QtLabel for pixmap
 70        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray):
 71            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
 72        self.setPixmap(colorData)
 73
 74    def resize(self):
 75        """Resize the widget and the label to fit the window size."""
 76        self.label.resize(self.size())
 77        self.label.setPixmap(self.imagePixmap.scaled(self.size(), Qt.KeepAspectRatio))
 78
 79    def resizeEvent(self, event):
 80        """Handle the resize event.
 81
 82        Args:
 83            event: The resize event
 84        """
 85        self.resize()
 86        super().resizeEvent(event)
 87
 88    def setPixmap(self, colorData):
 89        """Set the pixmap from color data.
 90
 91        Args:
 92            colorData (numpy.ndarray): Color data of the image
 93
 94        Returns:
 95            QPixmap: The pixmap created from the color data
 96        """
 97        if not isinstance(colorData, np.ndarray):
 98            colorData = ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData()
 99        height, width, channel = colorData.shape  # compute pixmap
100        bytesPerLine = channel * width
101        # clip
102        colorData[colorData > 1.0] = 1.0
103        colorData[colorData < 0.0] = 0.0
104
105        qImg = QImage((colorData * 255).astype(np.uint8), width, height, bytesPerLine, QImage.Format_RGB888)  # QImage
106        self.imagePixmap = QPixmap.fromImage(qImg)
107        self.resize()
108
109        return self.imagePixmap
110
111    def setQPixmap(self, qPixmap):
112        """Set the pixmap directly from a QPixmap.
113
114        Args:
115            qPixmap (QPixmap): The QPixmap to set
116        """
117        self.imagePixmap = qPixmap
118        self.resize()
119
120    @staticmethod
121    def emptyImageColorData():
122        """Create an empty image color data array.
123
124        Returns:
125            numpy.ndarray: An array filled with a light gray color
126        """
127        return np.ones((90, 160, 3)) * (220 / 255)

class FigureWidget(matplotlib.backends.backend_qtagg.FigureCanvasQTAgg): 
129class FigureWidget(FigureCanvas):
130    """Matplotlib Figure Widget"""
131
132    def __init__(self, parent=None, width=5, height=5, dpi=100):
133        """Initialize the FigureWidget.
134
135        Args:
136            parent (QWidget, optional): Parent widget. Defaults to None.
137            width (int, optional): Width of the figure. Defaults to 5.
138            height (int, optional): Height of the figure. Defaults to 5.
139            dpi (int, optional): Dots per inch. Defaults to 100.
140        """
141        # create Figure
142        self.fig = Figure(figsize=(width, height), dpi=dpi)
143        self.axes = self.fig.add_subplot(111)
144        FigureCanvas.__init__(self, self.fig)  # explicit call of super constructor
145        self.setParent(parent)
146        FigureCanvas.updateGeometry(self)
147        self.setMinimumSize(200, 200)
148
149    def plot(self, X, Y, mode, clear=False):
150        """Plot data on the figure.
151
152        Args:
153            X (array-like): X data to plot
154            Y (array-like): Y data to plot
155            mode (str): Plot mode
156            clear (bool, optional): Whether to clear the axes before plotting. Defaults to False.
157        """
158        if clear:
159            self.axes.clear()
160        self.axes.plot(X, Y, mode)
161        try:
162            self.fig.canvas.draw()
163        except Exception:
164            time.sleep(0.5)
165            self.fig.canvas.draw()

class ImageGalleryView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
167class ImageGalleryView(QSplitter):
168    """
169    ImageGallery(QSplitter)
170
171    +-------------------------------------------+
172    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | \
173    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
174    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
175    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
176    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
177    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
178    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |   >   GridLayout
179    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
180    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
181    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ |  |
182    | |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |ImgW| |  |
183    | +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ +----+ | /
184    +-------------------------------------------+  <    splitter
185    | [<] [1x1][3x2][6x4][9x6][page number] [>] |       [pushButton] HorizontalLayout
186    +-------------------------------------------+
187    """
188
189    def __init__(self, controller_=None, shapeMode=None):
190        """Initialize the ImageGalleryView.
191
192        Args:
193            controller_ (optional): Reference to the controller. Defaults to None.
194            shapeMode (optional): Shape mode for the gallery. Defaults to None.
195        """
196        if pref.verbose:
197            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.__init__()")
198
199        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
200
201        self.controller = controller_
202        self.shapeMode = controller.GalleryMode._3x2 if not shapeMode else shapeMode  # default display mode
203        self.pageNumber = 0
204
205        self.imagesControllers = []
206
207        self.images = QFrame()
208        self.images.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
209        self.imagesLayout = QGridLayout()
210        self.images.setLayout(self.imagesLayout)
211
212        self.buildGridLayoutWidgets()
213
214        self.previousPageButton = QPushButton('<')
215        self.previousPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_previousPage)
216        self._1x1Button = QPushButton('1x1')
217        self._1x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_1x1)
218        self._2x1Button = QPushButton('2x1')
219        self._2x1Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_2x1)
220        self._3x2Button = QPushButton('3x2')
221        self._3x2Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_3x2)
222        self._6x4Button = QPushButton('6x4')
223        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
224        self._9x6Button = QPushButton('9x6')
225        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
226        self.nextPageButton = QPushButton('>')
227        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
228
229        self.pageNumberLabel = QLabel(str(self.pageNumber) + "/ ...")
230
231        self.buttons = QWidget()
232        self.buttonsLayout = QHBoxLayout()
233        self.buttons.setLayout(self.buttonsLayout)
234        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.previousPageButton)
235        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._1x1Button)
236        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._2x1Button)
237        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._3x2Button)
238        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._6x4Button)
239        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self._9x6Button)
240        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.nextPageButton)
241
242        self.buttonsLayout.addWidget(self.pageNumberLabel)
243
244        self.addWidget(self.images)
245        self.addWidget(self.buttons)
246        self.setSizes([1525, 82])
247
248    def currentPage(self):
249        """Get the current page number.
250
251        Returns:
252            int: Current page number
253        """
254        return self.pageNumber
255
256    def changePageNumber(self, step):
257        """Change the current page number by a given step.
258
259        Args:
260            step (int): Step to change the page number
261        """
262        if pref.verbose:
263            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(", step, ")")
264
265        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode) * controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
266        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes) - 1) // nbImagePerPage) + 1
267
268        if len(self.controller.model.processPipes) > 0:
269            oldPageNumber = self.pageNumber
270            if (self.pageNumber + step) > maxPage - 1:
271                self.pageNumber = 0
272            elif (self.pageNumber + step) < 0:
273                self.pageNumber = maxPage - 1
274            else:
275                self.pageNumber = self.pageNumber + step
276            self.updateImages()
277            self.controller.model.loadPage(self.pageNumber)
278            if pref.verbose:
279                print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.changePageNumber(currentPage:", self.pageNumber, "| max page:", maxPage, ")")
280
281    def updateImages(self):
282        """Update the images in the gallery."""
283        if pref.verbose:
284            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImages()")
285
286        nbImagePerPage = controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode) * controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)
287        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes) - 1) // nbImagePerPage) + 1
288
289        index = 0
290        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)):
291            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
292                iwc = self.imagesControllers[index]
293                iwc.view.setPixmap(ImageWidgetView.emptyImageColorData())
294                index += 1
295        self.pageNumberLabel.setText(str(self.pageNumber) + "/" + str(maxPage - 1))
296
297    def updateImage(self, idx, processPipe, filename):
298        """Update a specific image in the gallery.
299
300        Args:
301            idx (int): Index of the image to update
302            processPipe: Process pipe associated with the image
303            filename (str): Filename of the image
304        """
305        if pref.verbose:
306            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.updateImage()")
307        imageWidgetController = self.imagesControllers[idx]
308        imageWidgetController.setImage(processPipe.getImage())
309        self.controller.parent.statusBar().showMessage("loading of image " + filename + " done!")
310
311    def resetGridLayoutWidgets(self):
312        """Reset the grid layout widgets."""
313        if pref.verbose:
314            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.resetGridLayoutWidgets()")
315
316        for w in self.imagesControllers:
317            self.imagesLayout.removeWidget(w.view)
318            w.view.deleteLater()
319        self.imagesControllers = []
320
321    def buildGridLayoutWidgets(self):
322        """Build the grid layout widgets."""
323        if pref.verbose:
324            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageGalleryView.buildGridLayoutWidgets()")
325
326        imageIndex = 0
327        for i in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbRow(self.shapeMode)):
328            for j in range(controller.GalleryMode.nbCol(self.shapeMode)):
329                iwc = controller.ImageWidgetController(id=imageIndex)
330                self.imagesControllers.append(iwc)
331                self.imagesLayout.addWidget(iwc.view, i, j)
332                imageIndex += 1
333
334    def wheelEvent(self, event):
335        """Handle the wheel event for changing pages.
336
337        Args:
338            event: The wheel event
339        """
340        if pref.verbose:
341            print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.wheelEvent()")
342
343        if event.angleDelta().y() < 0:
344            self.changePageNumber(+1)
345            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1:
346                self.controller.selectImage(0)
347
348        else:
349            self.changePageNumber(-1)
350            if self.shapeMode == controller.GalleryMode._1x1:
351                self.controller.selectImage(0)
352        event.accept()
353
354    def mousePressEvent(self, event):
355        """Handle the mouse press event for selecting images.
356
357        Args:
358            event: The mouse press event
359        """
360        if pref.verbose:
361            print(" [EVENT] >> ImageGalleryView.mousePressEvent()")
362
363        if isinstance(self.childAt(event.pos()).parent(), ImageWidgetView):
364            id = self.childAt(event.pos()).parent().controller.id()
365        else:
366            id = -1
367
368        if id != -1:  # an image is clicked, select it!
369            self.controller.selectImage(id)
370        event.accept()

ImageGalleryView(controller_=None, shapeMode=None)

222        self._6x4Button = QPushButton('6x4')
223        self._6x4Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_6x4)
224        self._9x6Button = QPushButton('9x6')
225        self._9x6Button.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_9x6)
226        self.nextPageButton = QPushButton('>')
227        self.nextPageButton.clicked.connect(self.controller.callBackButton_nextPage)
228

230

def changePageNumber(self, step):

266        maxPage = ((len(self.controller.model.processPipes) - 1) // nbImagePerPage) + 1
267

378        """Initialize the AppView.
379
380        Args:
381            _controller (optional): Reference to the controller. Defaults to None.
382            shapeMode (optional): Shape mode for the gallery. Defaults to None.
383            HDRcontroller (optional): Reference to the HDR controller. Defaults to None.
384        """
385        super().__init__()
386        scale = 0.8
387        self.controller = _controller
388        self.setWindowGeometry(scale=scale)
389        self.setWindowTitle('uHDR - Rmi Cozot (c) 2020-2021')  # title
390        self.statusBar().showMessage('Welcome to uHDR!')  # status bar
391
392        self.topContainer = QWidget()

394

396
397        self.topLayout.addWidget(self.imageGalleryController.view)
398
399        self.topContainer.setLayout(self.topLayout)
400        self.setCentralWidget(self.topContainer)
401        self.dock = controller.MultiDockController(self, HDRcontroller)
402        self.addDockWidget(Qt.RightDockWidgetArea, self.dock.view)
403        self.resizeDocks([self.dock.view], [int(self.controller.screenSize[0].width() * scale // 4)], Qt.Horizontal)
404
405        self.buildFileMenu()
406        self.buildDockMenu()
407        self.buildDisplayHDR()
408        self.buildExport()
409        self.buildPreferences()

411    def getImageGalleryController(self):
412        """Get the image gallery controller.
413
414        Returns:
415            ImageGalleryController: The image gallery controller
416        """
417        return self.imageGalleryController

420        """Handle the resize event.
421
422        Args:
423            event: The resize event
424        """
425        super().resizeEvent(event)
426
427    def setWindowGeometry(self, scale=0.8):
428        """Set the window geometry.
429
430        Args:
431            scale (float, optional): Scale factor for the window size. Defaults to 0.8.
432        """
433        displayCoord = QDesktopWidget().screenGeometry(1)
434        if len(self.controller.screenSize) > 1:
435            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[1].width(), self.controller.screenSize[1].height()
436        else:
437            width, height = self.controller.screenSize[0].width(), self.controller.screenSize[0].height()
438
439        self.setGeometry(displayCoord.left(), displayCoord.top() + 50, math.floor(width * scale), math.floor(height * scale))
440        self.showMaximized()
441
442    def buildFileMenu(self):
443        """Build the file menu."""
444        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
445        fileMenu = menubar.addMenu('&File')  # file menu
446
447        selectDir = QAction('&Select directory', self)
448        selectDir.setShortcut('Ctrl+O')
449        selectDir.setStatusTip('[File] select a directory')
450        selectDir.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSelectDir)
451        fileMenu.addAction(selectDir)
452
453        selectSave = QAction('&Save', self)
454        selectSave.setShortcut('Ctrl+S')
455        selectSave.setStatusTip('[File] saving processpipe metadata')
456        selectSave.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackSave)
457        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)
458
459        quit = QAction('&Quit', self)
460        quit.setShortcut('Ctrl+Q')
461        quit.setStatusTip('[File] saving updates and quit')
462        quit.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackQuit)
463        fileMenu.addAction(quit)
464
465    def buildPreferences(self):
466        """Build the preferences menu."""
467        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
468        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')  # file menu
469
470        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
471
472        def cbd(tag):
473            """Callback function for setting the display.
474
475            Args:
476                tag: Display tag
477            """
478            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
479            self.statusBar().showMessage("switching HDR Display to: " + tag + "!")
480            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
481            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
482
483        prefDisplays = []
484        for i, d in enumerate(displayList):
485            if d != 'none':
486                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to ' + d, self)
487                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
488                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
489                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)
490
491    def buildDisplayHDR(self):
492        """Build the display HDR menu."""
493        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
494        displayHDRmenu = menubar.addMenu('&Display HDR')  # file menu
495
496        displayHDR = QAction('&Display HDR image', self)
497        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+H')

499        displayHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackDisplayHDR)
500        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)
501
502        displayHDR = QAction('&Compare raw and edited HDR image', self)
503        displayHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+C')
504        displayHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] compare raw HDR image and edited one')

506        displayHDRmenu.addAction(displayHDR)

508        closeHDR = QAction('&reset HDR display', self)
509        closeHDR.setShortcut('Ctrl+K')
510        closeHDR.setStatusTip('[Display HDR] reset HDR window')
511        closeHDR.triggered.connect(self.controller.callBackCloseDisplayHDR)

457        fileMenu.addAction(selectSave)

def buildPreferences(self): 
465    def buildPreferences(self):
466        """Build the preferences menu."""
467        menubar = self.menuBar()  # get menubar
468        prefMenu = menubar.addMenu('&Preferences')  # file menu
469
470        displayList = pref.getHDRdisplays().keys()
471
472        def cbd(tag):
473            """Callback function for setting the display.
474
475            Args:
476                tag: Display tag
477            """
478            pref.setHDRdisplay(tag)
479            self.statusBar().showMessage("switching HDR Display to: " + tag + "!")
480            self.menuExport.setText('&Export to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
481            self.menuExportAll.setText('&Export All to ' + pref.getHDRdisplay()['tag'])
482
483        prefDisplays = []
484        for i, d in enumerate(displayList):
485            if d != 'none':
486                prefDisplay = QAction('&Set display to ' + d, self)
487                p_cbd = functools.partial(cbd, d)
488                prefDisplay.triggered.connect(p_cbd)
489                prefMenu.addAction(prefDisplay)

class ImageInfoView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QSplitter): 
568class ImageInfoView(QSplitter):
569    """A view for displaying image information and metadata."""
570
571    def __init__(self, _controller):
572        """Initialize the ImageInfoView.
573
574        Args:
575            _controller: Reference to the controller
576        """
577        if pref.verbose:
578            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.__init__()")
579
580        super().__init__(Qt.Vertical)
581
582        self.controller = _controller
583
584        self.imageWidgetController = controller.ImageWidgetController()
585
586        self.layout = QFormLayout()
587
588        # Image information fields
589        self.imageName = AdvanceLineEdit(" name:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
590        self.imagePath = AdvanceLineEdit(" path:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
591        self.imageSize = AdvanceLineEdit(" size (pixel):", ".... x .... ", self.layout, callBack=None)
592        self.imageDynamicRange = AdvanceLineEdit(" dynamic range (f-stops)", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
593        self.colorSpace = AdvanceLineEdit(" color space:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
594        self.imageType = AdvanceLineEdit(" type:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
595        self.imageBPS = AdvanceLineEdit(" bits per sample:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
596        self.imageExpoTime = AdvanceLineEdit(" exposure time:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
597        self.imageFNumber = AdvanceLineEdit("f-number:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
598        self.imageISO = AdvanceLineEdit(" ISO:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
599        self.imageCamera = AdvanceLineEdit(" camera:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
600        self.imageSoftware = AdvanceLineEdit(" software:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
601        self.imageLens = AdvanceLineEdit(" lens:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
602        self.imageFocalLength = AdvanceLineEdit(" focal length:", " ........ ", self.layout, callBack=None)
603
604        # Separator line
605        line = QFrame()
606        line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
607        self.layout.addRow(line)
608
609        # User-defined tags
610        userDefinedTags = hdrCore.metadata.tags()
611        tagRootName = userDefinedTags.getTagsRootName()
612        listOfTags = userDefinedTags.tags[tagRootName]
613        self.userDefinedTags = []
614        for tagGroup in listOfTags:
615            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
616            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
617            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
618                self.userDefinedTags.append(AdvanceCheckBox(self, groupKey, tag[0], False, self.layout))
619            line = QFrame()
620            line.setFrameShape(QFrame.HLine)
621            self.layout.addRow(line)
622
623        self.layout.setSizeConstraint(QLayout.SetMinAndMaxSize)
624
625        self.scroll = QScrollArea()
626        self.scroll.setVerticalScrollBarPolicy(Qt.ScrollBarAlwaysOn)
627        self.container = QLabel()
628        self.container.setLayout(self.layout)
629        self.scroll.setWidget(self.container)
630        self.scroll.setWidgetResizable(True)
631
632        self.addWidget(self.imageWidgetController.view)
633        self.addWidget(self.scroll)
634        self.setSizes([60, 40])
635
636    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
637        """Set the process pipe and update the view with image metadata.
638
639        Args:
640            processPipe: The process pipe to set
641        """
642        image_ = processPipe.getImage()
643        if pref.verbose:
644            print(" [VIEW] >> ImageInfoView.setImage(", image_.name, ")")
645        if image_.metadata.metadata['filename'] is not None:
646            self.imageName.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['filename'])
647        else:
648            self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
649        if image_.metadata.metadata['path'] is not None:
650            self.imagePath.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['path'])
651        else:
652            self.imagePath.setText(" ........ ")
653        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width'] is not None:
654            self.imageSize.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Width']) + " x " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Image Height']))
655        else:
656            self.imageSize.setText(" ........ ")
657        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)'] is not None:
658            self.imageDynamicRange.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Dynamic Range (stops)']))
659        else:
660            self.imageDynamicRange.setText(" ........ ")
661        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'] is not None:
662            self.colorSpace.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Color Space'])
663        else:
664            self.imageName.setText(" ........ ")
665        if image_.type is not None:
666            self.imageType.setText(str(image_.type))
667        else:
668            self.colorSpace.setText(" ........ ")
669        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample'] is not None:
670            self.imageBPS.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Bits Per Sample']))
671        else:
672            self.imageBPS.setText(" ........ ")
673        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'] is not None:
674            self.imageExpoTime.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][0]) + " / " + str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Exposure Time'][1]))
675        else:
676            self.imageExpoTime.setText(" ........ ")
677        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'] is not None:
678            self.imageFNumber.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['F Number'][0]))
679        else:
680            self.imageFNumber.setText(" ........ ")
681        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO'] is not None:
682            self.imageISO.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['ISO']))
683        else:
684            self.imageISO.setText(" ........ ")
685        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'] is not None:
686            self.imageCamera.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Camera'])
687        else:
688            self.imageCamera.setText(" ........ ")
689        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'] is not None:
690            self.imageSoftware.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Software'])
691        else:
692            self.imageSoftware.setText(" ........ ")
693        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'] is not None:
694            self.imageLens.setText(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Lens'])
695        else:
696            self.imageLens.setText(" ........ ")
697        if image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'] is not None:
698            self.imageFocalLength.setText(str(image_.metadata.metadata['exif']['Focal Length'][0]))
699        else:
700            self.imageFocalLength.setText(" ........ ")
701
702        self.controller.callBackActive = False
703
704        tagRootName = image_.metadata.otherTags.getTagsRootName()
705        listOfTags = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName]
706
707        for i, tagGroup in enumerate(listOfTags):
708            groupKey = list(tagGroup.keys())[0]
709            tagLeafs = tagGroup[groupKey]
710            for tag in tagLeafs.items():
711                for acb in self.userDefinedTags:
712                    if (acb.rightText == tag[0]) and (acb.leftText == groupKey):
713                        on_off = image_.metadata.metadata[tagRootName][i][groupKey][tag[0]]
714                        on_off = on_off if on_off else False
715                        acb.setState(on_off)
716                        break
717
718        self.controller.callBackActive = True
719
720        return self.imageWidgetController.setImage(image_)
721
722    def metadataChange(self, metaGroup, metaTag, on_off):
723        """Handle metadata changes.
724
725        Args:
726            metaGroup: The group of the metadata
727            metaTag: The tag of the metadata
728            on_off: The new value of the metadata
729        """
730        if self.controller.callBackActive:
731            self.controller.metadataChange(metaGroup, metaTag, on_off)

737        """Initialize the AdvanceLineEdit.
738
739        Args:
740            labelName (str): The name of the label
741            defaultText (str): The default text for the line edit
742            layout: The layout to add the widget to
743            callBack (optional): Callback function for text changes. Defaults to None.
744        """
745        self.label = QLabel(labelName)
746        self.lineEdit = QLineEdit(defaultText)
747        if callBack:
748            self.lineEdit.textChanged.connect(callBack)
749        layout.addRow(self.label, self.lineEdit)
750

752        """Set the text of the line edit.

754        Args:
755            txt (str): The text to set
756        """
757        self.lineEdit.setText(txt)

class AdvanceCheckBox: 
759class AdvanceCheckBox(object):
760    """A custom QCheckBox widget with a label."""
761
762    def __init__(self, parent, leftText, rightText, defaultValue, layout):
763        """Initialize the AdvanceCheckBox.
764
765        Args:
766            parent: Reference to the parent widget
767            leftText (str): The text for the label
768            rightText (str): The text for the checkbox
769            defaultValue: The default value of the checkbox
770            layout: The layout to add the widget to
771        """
772        self.parent = parent
773        self.leftText = leftText
774        self.rightText = rightText
775
776        self.label = QLabel(leftText)
777        self.checkbox = QCheckBox(rightText)
778        self.checkbox.toggled.connect(self.toggled)
779        layout.addRow(self.label, self.checkbox)
780
781    def setState(self, on_off):
782        """Set the state of the checkbox.
783
784        Args:
785            on_off (bool): The state to set
786        """
787        self.checkbox.setChecked(on_off)
788
789    def toggled(self):
790        """Handle the toggled event of the checkbox."""
791        self.parent.metadataChange(self.leftText, self.rightText, self.checkbox.isChecked())

class MultiDockView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDockWidget): 
1016class MultiDockView(QDockWidget):
1017    """A dock widget for switching between different views."""
1018
1019    def __init__(self, _controller, HDRcontroller=None):
1020        """Initialize the MultiDockView.
1021
1022        Args:
1023            _controller: Reference to the controller
1024            HDRcontroller (optional): Reference to the HDR controller. Defaults to None.
1025        """
1026        if pref.verbose:
1027            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.__init__()")
1028
1029        super().__init__("Image Edit/Info")
1030        self.controller = _controller
1031
1032        self.setAllowedAreas(Qt.LeftDockWidgetArea | Qt.RightDockWidgetArea)
1033
1034        self.childControllers = [
1035            controller.EditImageController(self, HDRcontroller),
1036            controller.ImageInfoController(self),
1037            controller.ImageAestheticsController(self)
1038        ]
1039        self.childController = self.childControllers[0]
1040        self.active = 0
1041        self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
1042        self.repaint()
1043
1044    def switch(self, nb):
1045        """Switch the active dock view.
1046
1047        Args:
1048            nb (int): The index of the view to switch to
1049        """
1050        if pref.verbose:
1051            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.switch(", nb, ")")
1052
1053        if nb != self.active:
1054            self.active = (nb) % len(self.childControllers)
1055            self.childController.view.deleteLater()
1056            self.childController = self.childControllers[self.active]
1057            processPipe = self.controller.parent.imageGalleryController.getSelectedProcessPipe()
1058            self.childController.buildView(processPipe)
1059            self.setWidget(self.childController.view)
1060            self.repaint()
1061
1062    def setProcessPipe(self, processPipe):
1063        """Set the process pipe for the active child controller.
1064
1065        Args:
1066            processPipe: The process pipe to set
1067
1068        Returns:
1069            The result of setting the process pipe in the child controller
1070        """
1071        if pref.verbose:
1072            print(" [VIEW] >> MultiDockView.setProcessPipe(", processPipe.getImage().name, ")")
1073        return self.childController.setProcessPipe(processPipe)

class AdvanceSliderView(PyQt5.QtWidgets.QFrame): 
1075class AdvanceSliderView(QFrame):
1076    """A custom slider widget with additional controls."""
1077
1078    def __init__(self, controller, name, defaultValue, range, step):
1079        """Initialize the AdvanceSliderView.
1080
1081        Args:
1082            controller: Reference to the controller
1083            name (str): The name of the slider
1084            defaultValue: The default value of the slider
1085            range (tuple): The range of the slider
1086            step (float): The step size of the slider
1087        """
1088        super().__init__()
1089        self.setFrameShape(QFrame.StyledPanel)
1090        self.controller = controller
1091        self.firstrow = QFrame()

1634    def sliderHueChange(self):
1635        """Handle the change of the hue sliders."""
1636        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1637        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1638
1639        # Redraw hue range and chroma bar
1640        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (100, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='h', height='c')
1641        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1642        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1643        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (0, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='c', height='L')
1644        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1645        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1646
1647        # Call controller
1648        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin, hmax)
1649
1650    def sliderChromaChange(self):
1651        """Handle the change of the chroma sliders."""
1652        vmin = self.sliderChromaMin.value()
1653        vmax = self.sliderChromaMax.value()
1654        # Call controller
1655        self.controller.sliderChromaChange(vmin, vmax)
1656
1657    def sliderLightnessChange(self):
1658        """Handle the change of the lightness sliders."""
1659        vmin = self.sliderLightMin.value() / 3.0
1660        vmax = self.sliderLightMax.value() / 3.0
1661        # Call controller
1662        self.controller.sliderLightnessChange(vmin, vmax)
1663
1664    def sliderExposureChange(self):
1665        """Handle the change of the exposure slider."""
1666        ev = round(self.sliderExposure.value() / 30, 1)
1667        self.valueExposure.setText(str(ev))
1668        self.controller.sliderExposureChange(ev)
1669
1670    def sliderSaturationChange(self):
1671        """Handle the change of the saturation slider."""
1672        ev = self.sliderSaturation.value()
1673        self.valueSaturation.setText(str(ev))
1674        self.controller.sliderSaturationChange(ev)
1675
1676    def sliderContrastChange(self):
1677        """Handle the change of the contrast slider."""
1678        ev = self.sliderContrast.value()
1679        self.valueContrast.setText(str(ev))
1680        self.controller.sliderContrastChange(ev)
1681
1682    def sliderHueShiftChange(self):
1683        """Handle the change of the hue shift slider."""
1684        hs = self.sliderHueShift.value()
1685        self.valueHueShift.setText(str(hs))
1686        self.controller.sliderHueShiftChange(hs)
1687
1688    def checkboxMaskChange(self):
1689        """Handle the change of the mask checkbox."""
1690        self.controller.checkboxMaskChange(self.checkboxMask.isChecked())

def sliderHueChange(self): 
1634    def sliderHueChange(self):
1635        """Handle the change of the hue sliders."""
1636        hmin = self.sliderHueMin.value()
1637        hmax = self.sliderHueMax.value()
1638
1639        # Redraw hue range and chroma bar
1640        hueRangeBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (100, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='h', height='c')
1641        hueRangeBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(hueRangeBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1642        self.imageHueRangeController.setImage(hueRangeBarRGB)
1643        saturationBarLch = hdrCore.image.Image.buildLchColorData((75, 75), (0, 100), (hmin, hmax), (20, 720), width='c', height='L')
1644        saturationBarRGB = hdrCore.processing.Lch_to_sRGB(saturationBarLch, apply_cctf_encoding=True, clip=True)
1645        self.imageSaturationController.setImage(saturationBarRGB)
1646
1647        # Call controller
1648        self.controller.sliderHueChange(hmin, hmax)
